funkatronics.code.tactilewaves.dsp.toolbox

Class Filter

  • java.lang.Object
    • funkatronics.code.tactilewaves.dsp.toolbox.Filter

  • public class Filter
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for filtering data series using recursive filters

    Butterworth, Critically Damped, and Bessel filter types are supported via instantiation with an arbitrary number of poles. A static method for filtering using any provided filter coefficients is available for custom filtering.

      • allPole

        public static Filter allPole(double Fc,
                             int passes,
                             int filterType,
                             boolean highPass)
        Returns an All-pole IIR filter according to the design parameters
        Parameters:
        Fc - the cutoff frequency, as a fraction of the sample rate (0.0-0.5)
        passes - the number of filter passes that will be used
        filterType - the type of filter (ALLPOLE_BUTTERWORTH, ALLPOLE_CRITICALLY_DAMPED, or ALLPOLE_BESSEL)
        highPass - is this filter a high pass filter?

      • chebyshev

        public static Filter chebyshev(double fc,
                               int NP,
                               double pr,
                               boolean highPass)
        Returns the coefficients of an all-pole IIR filter with these parameters
        Parameters:
        fc - the cutoff frequency, as a fraction of the sample rate (0.0-0.5)
        NP - the number of poles of the filter
        pr - the percentage of ripple in in the passband
        highPass - is this filter a high pass filter?

      • biquad

        public static Filter biquad(double Fc,
                            double Q,
                            double dBgain,
                            int filterType)
